00042 class RealFunctionFactory {
00043     public:
00044         virtual ~RealFunctionFactory() { }
00046         RealFunction *createFunction(C4DView *view) {
00047             return doCreateFunction(view);
00048         }
00049 
00050     private:
00052         virtual RealFunction *doCreateFunction(C4DView *) = 0;
00053 };
